GetAOERadius.description: Gets the AoE radius of this Ability.

GetAbilityDamage.description: Get the basic damage value of this Ability.

GetAutoCastState.description: Get the autocast state of this Ability.

GetBehavior.description: Get the behavior type of this Ability.

GetCastPoint.description: Gets the cast point of this Ability.

GetCastRange.description: Gets the cast range of this Ability.

GetCaster.description: Get the unit who owns this Ability.

GetChannelTime.description: How long does this Ability channel?

GetChannelledManaCostPerSecond.description: Get the mana cost per second of this Ability while channeling it.

GetCooldown.description: Get the cooldown of this Abilty.

GetCooldownTimeRemaining.description: Get the cooldown time remaning for this Ability.

GetCurrentCharges.description: Get the current charges of this item.

GetDamageType.description: Get the damage type of this Ability.

GetDuration.description: How long does this Ability persist once cast?

GetEstimatedDamageToTarget.description: How much damage would this ability do to the specified target over the specified duration?

GetHeroLevelRequiredToUpgrade.description: Get the Hero level required to upgrade this Ability.

GetInitialCharges.description: Get the initial charges of this item.

GetLevel.description: Get the current level of the Ability.

GetManaCost.description: Get the mana cost of this Ability.

GetMaxLevel.description: Get the max level of this Ability.

GetName.description: Get the name of this Ability.

GetPowerTreadsStat.description: Get the stat these power treads are set to.

GetSecondaryCharges.description: Get the secondary charges of this item.

GetSpecialValueFloat.description: Get an int internal data parameter of this Abilty.

GetSpecialValueInt.description: Get an int internal data parameter of this Abilty.

GetTargetFlags.description: Get the flags for this Ability.

GetTargetTeam.description: Get the target team of this Ability.

GetTargetType.description: Get the target type of this Ability.

GetToggleState.description: Get the toggle state of this Ability.

IsFullyCastable.description: Does the caster have the mana to use this Ability, and is it off cooldown?

IsOwnersManaEnough.description: Does the caster have the mana to use this Ability?

IsStolen.description: Is this the stolen version of an Ability?

IsTrained.description: Is this Ability Trained at all?

ProcsMagicStick.description: Does this Ability proc Magic Stick?

ToggleAutoCast.description: Toggle the autocast state of this Ability.

CDOTA_Bot_Script.description: A unit referenced from Dota bot script

ActionImmediate_Buyback.description: Tell a bot to buy back into the game.

ActionImmediate_Chat.description: Tell a bot to say something.

ActionImmediate_Courier.description: Tell a bot to use the courier.

ActionImmediate_DisassembleItem.description: Tell a bot to disassemble an item.

ActionImmediate_Glyph.description: Tell a bot to use glyph.

ActionImmediate_LevelAbility.description: Tell a bot to level up a specific ability.

ActionImmediate_Ping.description: Tell a bot to ping a location.

ActionImmediate_PurchaseItem.description: Tell a bot to purchase an item by name.

ActionImmediate_SellItem.description: Tell a bot to sell an item.

ActionImmediate_SetItemCombineLock.description: Set the combine state on an item.

ActionImmediate_SwapItems.description: Tell a bot to swap the contents of two item slots.

ActionPush_AttackMove.description: Tell a bot to attack-move a location.

ActionPush_AttackUnit.description: Tell a bot to attack a target unit. If bOnce is specified, it will auto-pop the action after one attack.

ActionPush_Delay.description: Tell a bot to delay for the specified number of seconds.

ActionPush_DropItem.description: Tell a bot to drop an item.

ActionPush_MoveToLocation.description: Tell a bot to move to a location.

ActionPush_MoveToUnit.description: Tell a bot to move to a unit and start following them.

ActionPush_PickUpItem.description: Tell a bot to pick up a dropped item.

ActionPush_PickUpRune.description: Tell a bot to pick up a rune.

ActionPush_UseAbility.description: Tell a bot to use a non-targeted ability.

ActionPush_UseAbilityOnEntity.description: Tell a bot to use a unit-targeted ability.

ActionPush_UseAbilityOnLocation.description: Tell a bot to use a location-targeted ability.

ActionPush_UseAbilityOnTree.description: Tell a bot to use a tree-targeted ability.

ActionPush_UseShrine.description: Tell a bot to use the specified shrine.

ActionQueue_AttackMove.description: Tell a bot to attack-move a location.

ActionQueue_AttackUnit.description: Tell a bot to attack a target unit. If bOnce is specified, it will auto-pop the action after one attack.

ActionQueue_Delay.description: Tell a bot to delay for the specified number of seconds.

ActionQueue_DropItem.description: Tell a bot to drop an item.

ActionQueue_MoveToLocation.description: Tell a bot to move to a location.

ActionQueue_MoveToUnit.description: Tell a bot to move to a unit and start following them.

ActionQueue_PickUpItem.description: Tell a bot to pick up a dropped item.

ActionQueue_PickUpRune.description: Tell a bot to pick up a rune.

ActionQueue_UseAbility.description: Tell a bot to use a non-targeted ability.

ActionQueue_UseAbilityOnEntity.description: Tell a bot to use a unit-targeted ability.

ActionQueue_UseAbilityOnLocation.description: Tell a bot to use a location-targeted ability.

ActionQueue_UseAbilityOnTree.description: Tell a bot to use a tree-targeted ability.

ActionQueue_UseShrine.description: Tell a bot to use the specified shrine.

Action_AttackMove.description: Tell a bot to attack-move a location.

Action_AttackUnit.description: Tell a bot to attack a target unit. If bOnce is specified, it will auto-pop the action after one attack.

Action_ClearActions.description: Clear current action stack and return to idle.  Optionally stop in place.

Action_Delay.description: Tell a bot to delay for the specified number of seconds.

Action_DropItem.description: Tell a bot to drop an item.

Action_MoveToLocation.description: Tell a bot to move to a location.

Action_MoveToUnit.description: Tell a bot to move to a unit and start following them.

Action_PickUpItem.description: Tell a bot to pick up a dropped item.

Action_PickUpRune.description: Tell a bot to pick up a rune.

Action_UseAbility.description: Tell a bot to use a non-targeted ability.

Action_UseAbilityOnEntity.description: Tell a bot to use a unit-targeted ability.

Action_UseAbilityOnLocation.description: Tell a bot to use a location-targeted ability.

Action_UseAbilityOnTree.description: Tell a bot to use a tree-targeted ability.

Action_UseShrine.description: Tell a bot to use the specified shrine.

CanBeSeen.description: Can we currently see this bot?  Always true for bots on our team.  Many functions will not return valid data without this being true.

DistanceFromFountain.description: Gets the unit's straight-line distance from the team's fountain (0 is in the fountain).

DistanceFromSecretShop.description: Gets the unit's straight-line distance from the closest secret shop (0 is in a secret shop).

DistanceFromSideShop.description: Gets the unit's straight-line distance from the closest side shop (0 is in a side shop).

FindAoELocation.description: Finds optimal AoE location that overlaps heroes/creeps.

FindItemSlot.description: Get the slot a named item is in

GetAbilityByName.description: Get a bot's ability by name

GetAbilityInSlot.description: Get a bot's ability by slot

GetAbilityPoints.description: Get the number of ability points the bot can spend.

GetAbilityTarget.description: Get the unit being targeted by an ability.

GetAcquisitionRange.description: Get the range at which this unit will start to attack a target.

GetActiveModeDesire.description: Get the desire value of the active mode

GetActualIncomingDamage.description: Gets the incoming damage value after reductions.

GetAnimActivity.description: Get the action the unit is currently performing.

GetAnimCycle.description: Get the amount the unit is through its current animation.

GetArmor.description: Gets the armor of the unit.

GetAssignedLane.description: Get the lane that a unit is assigned to.

GetAttackCombatProficiency.description: Gets the damage multiplier for attacks on the specified unit.

GetAttackPoint.description: Gets the attack point of the unit.

GetAttackProjectileSpeed.description: Get the speed of the attack projectile for ranged units.

GetAttackRange.description: Gets the attack range of the unit.

GetAttackSpeed.description: Gets the attack speed of the unit.

GetAttributeValue.description: Gets the evasion resist of the unit.

GetBaseDamage.description: Gets the base attack damage of the unit.

GetBaseDamageVariance.description: Gets the variance of the base attack damage.

GetBaseHealthRegen.description: Get a bot's base health regen rate.

GetBaseManaRegen.description: Get a bot's base mana regen rate.

GetBaseMovementSpeed.description: Get a bot's base movement speed.

GetBoundingRadius.description: Get the size of the unit's bounding radius.

GetBountyGoldMax.description: Gets the maximum amount of gold rewarded by killing this unit.

GetBountyGoldMin.description: Gets the minimum amount of gold rewarded by killing this unit.

GetBountyXP.description: Gets the amount of XP rewarded by killing this unit.

GetBuybackCooldown.description: Get the current cooldown on buying back.

GetBuybackCost.description: Get the current cost of buying back.

GetCourierValue.description: Get the value of items on the courier owned by this bot.

GetCurrentActionType.description: Get the type of the current action.

GetCurrentActiveAbility.description: Get the ability this bot is currently casting.

GetCurrentMovementSpeed.description: Get a bot's current movement speed.

GetCurrentVisionRange.description: Get the unit's current vision range.

GetDayTimeVisionRange.description: Get the unit's vision range during the day.

GetDefendCombatProficiency.description: Gets the damage multiplier for attacks from the specified unit.

GetDenies.description: Get the deny count of this bot.

GetEstimatedDamageToTarget.description: Get an estimate of how much damage a bot can do in the specified timeframe.  Takes into account item and ability usage based on current mana/cooldowns for allies, for enemies it assumes all items/abilities are available.  Uses no positional/situation info.  Basically asks 'How scary is X to Y?'.

GetEvasion.description: Gets the evasion resist of the unit.

GetExtrapolatedLocation.description: Extrapolates their location in the future, based on past movement.

GetHealthRegen.description: Get a bot's health regen rate.

GetHealthRegenPerStr.description: Get amount of health regen given per unit of strength.

GetIncomingTrackingProjectiles.description: Gets the location and ability of projectiles incoming at this unit.

GetItemInSlot.description: Get a bot's item by slot

GetItemSlotType.description: Get the type of the specified item slot

GetLastAttackTime.description: Gets the last attack time of the unit.

GetLastHits.description: Get the last hit count of this bot.

GetMagicResist.description: Gets the magic resist of the unit.

GetManaRegen.description: Get a bot's mana regen rate.

GetManaRegenPerInt.description: Get amount of mana regen given per unit of intellect.

GetModifierAuxiliaryUnits.description: Get a table of a modifier's auxiliary units.

GetModifierByName.description: Get the modifier index of a specified modifier.

GetModifierList.description: Gets a table of all the modifiers on this unit.

GetMostRecentPing.description: Get the most recent ping by this player.

GetMovementDirectionStability.description: Indicates how consistent the unit's movement has been over the last few seconds.  1 is a straight line, 0 is serpentine.

GetNearbyCreeps.description: Get nearby creeps (lane or neutral) that we can see.

GetNearbyHeroes.description: Get nearby heroes that we can see in a mode.  Can specify a bot mode when querying allies.  BOT_MODE_NONE does no mode filtering.

GetNearbyLaneCreeps.description: Get nearby lane creeps that we can see.

GetNearbyNeutralCreeps.description: Get nearby neutral creeps that we can see.

GetNetWorth.description: Get the bot's current net worth.

GetNextItemPurchaseValue.description: Gets the purchase value of the next item the unit wants to purchase.

GetNightTimeVisionRange.description: Get the unit's vision range during the night.

GetOffensivePower.description: Get the unit's current offensive power.

GetPlayerID.description: Get the unit's controlling player id.

GetPrimaryAttribute.description: Gets the evasion resist of the unit.

GetQueuedActionType.description: Get the specified action in the queue.

GetRawOffensivePower.description: Get the unit's raw offensive power.

GetRemainingLifespan.description: Get remaining lifespan of a unit.

GetRespawnTime.description: Get the time in seconds until a bot respawns.

GetSecondsPerAttack.description: Gets the number of seconds per attack that a unit can do.

GetSlowDuration.description: Get the duration of available slows.

GetSpellAmp.description: Gets the spell damage amplification of the unit.

GetStashValue.description: Get the value of the items in the bot's stash.

GetStunDuration.description: Get the duration of available stuns.

GetTalent.description: Get one of the talents at the specified level

GetTarget.description: Get the current target of this bot.

GetVelocity.description: Get the velocity the unit has moved over the last two seconds.

GetXPNeededToLevel.description: Get the amount of XP needed to level up.

HasBlink.description: Does the bot have a blink available?

HasInvisibility.description: Does the bot have invisibility available?

HasMinistunOnAttack.description: Does the bot have ministuns on attack?

HasModifier.description: Does the bot have the specified modifier?

HasScepter.description: Does the unit have Aghanim's Scepter?

HasSilence.description: Does the bot have a silence available?

IsAncientCreep.description: Is this unit an ancient creep?

IsBot.description: Is this unit owned by a bot?

IsCastingAbility.description: Is this bot currently casting an ability?

IsChanneling.description: Is this bot currently channeling an ability?

IsFacingLocation.description: Is the unit facing this location, within the specified degree tolerance?

IsFort.description: Is this unit a fort (the main ancient building)?

IsUnableToMiss.description: Is the unit unable to miss?

IsUsingAbility.description: Is this bot currently using an ability?

NumModifiers.description: Get the number of modifiers on this bot.

NumQueuedActions.description: Get the number actions currently queued.

SetNextItemPurchaseValue.description: Sets the value of the next item the unit wants to purchase.

SetTarget.description: Set the current target of this bot. Causes no actions, but is used for coordinating between modes and ability/item usage.

TimeSinceDamagedByAnyHero.description: How long as it been since the unit was damaged by any enemy?

TimeSinceDamagedByCreep.description: How long as it been since the unit was damaged by a creep?

TimeSinceDamagedByHero.description: How long as it been since the unit was damaged by an specific enemy?

TimeSinceDamagedByPlayer.description: How long as it been since the unit was damaged by an specific player?

TimeSinceDamagedByTower.description: How long as it been since the unit was damaged by a tower?

UsingItemBreaksInvisibility.description: Will using an item break invisibiilty?

WasRecentlyDamagedByAnyHero.description: Was the unit recently damaged by any enemy?

WasRecentlyDamagedByCreep.description: Was the unit recently damaged by a creep?

WasRecentlyDamagedByHero.description: Was the unit recently damaged by an specific enemy?

WasRecentlyDamagedByPlayer.description: Was the unit recently damaged by an specific player?

WasRecentlyDamagedByTower.description: Was the unit recently damaged by a tower?

CMBanHero.description: Ban a hero in Captain's mode by name.

CMPickHero.description: Pick a hero in Captain's mode by name.

Clamp.description: Clamps the value between the two supplied values.

DebugDrawCircle.description: Draws a circle for one frame

DebugDrawLine.description: Draws a line for one frame

DotaTime.description: Gets the game time -- matches the in-game clock.  Pauses with game pause.

GameTime.description: Gets the time since the hero picking phase started.  Pauses with game pause.

GetAllTrees.description: Returns a table with all tree locations

GetAmountAlongLane.description: Calculates the amount along the lane (and distance from the lane) for the specified location.

GetAncient.description: Gets the ancient on the specified team.

GetAvoidanceZones.description: Gets an array	 of all visible avoidance zones in a {ability, location, radius} table.

GetBarracks.description: Gets the specified barracks on the specified team.

GetBot.description: Get the bot on which script is currently being run.

GetCMCaptain.description: Gets player ID of the Captain's Mode captain.

GetCMPhaseTimeRemaining.description: Get the amount of time remaining in the current Captain's Mode phase.

GetCourierState.description: Gets a specific courier's current state.

GetDefendLaneDesire.description: Gets the team-wide desire to defend a lane.

GetDroppedItemList.description: Returns the array of items that we can see that have been dropped on the ground.

GetFarmLaneDesire.description: Gets the team-wide desire to farm a lane.

GetGameState.description: Gets the current state of the game.

GetGameStateTimeRemaining.description: Gets how much time is remaining in the current game state.

GetGlyphCooldown.description: Returns the cooldown on glyph (0 if available).

GetHeightLevel.description: Get the height level (1 through 5) of the specified location.

GetHeroAssists.description: Gets the assists of the hero controlled by the specified PlayerID.

GetHeroDeaths.description: Gets the deaths of the hero controlled by the specified PlayerID.

GetHeroKills.description: Gets the kills of the hero controlled by the specified PlayerID.

GetHeroLastSeenInfo.description: Gets the {location, time} of the last seen PlayerID unit.

GetHeroLevel.description: Gets the level of the hero controlled by the specified PlayerID.

GetHeroPickState.description: Gets the current phase of hero picking.

GetIncomingTeleports.description: Gets a table of all the teleports that are visibly happening.

GetItemComponents.description: Returns a table of items required to make the specified item.

GetItemCost.description: Get the cost of an item by name.

GetItemStockCount.description: Get the current stock count for the named item.

GetLaneFrontAmount.description: Gets the lane front amount (0.0 - 1.0) of the specified team's creeps along the specified lane.  Optionally can ignore towers for front calculation.

GetLaneFrontLocation.description: Gets the location of the lane front for the specified team and lane.  Always ignores towers.  Has a third parameter for a distance delta from the front.

GetLinearProjectileByHandle.description: Gets a specific linear projectile's info using its handle.

GetLinearProjectiles.description: Gets an array of all visible linear projectiles in a {ability, location, velocity, radius} table.

GetLocationAlongLane.description: Calculates the location of the specified amount (0.0 - 1.0) along the specified lane.

GetNeutralSpawners.description: Get the location of all neutral spawners, and what side of the river they're on.

GetNumCouriers.description: Gets the number of couriers on the team.

GetOpposingTeam.description: Gets the team that you're fighting against.

GetPushLaneDesire.description: Gets the team-wide desire to push a lane.

GetRoamDesire.description: Gets the team-wide desire to roam to a target.

GetRoamTarget.description: Gets the target of the team-wide roam desire.

GetRoshanDesire.description: Gets the team-wide desire to kill Roshan.

GetRoshanKillTime.description: Returns the last time that Roshan was killed.

GetRuneSpawnLocation.description: Gets the spawn location of the specified rune.

GetRuneStatus.description: Gets the status of the specified rune.

GetRuneTimeSinceSeen.description: Gets the time since we've seen the specified rune.

GetRuneType.description: Gets the type of the specified rune, if known.

GetScriptDirectory.description: Get the directory from which bot scripts are being run.

GetSelectedHeroName.description: Gets the name of the hero selected by a player.

GetShopLocation.description: Get location for the specified shop.

GetShrine.description: Gets the specified shrine on the specified team.

GetShrineCooldown.description: Gets the healing cooldown of the specified shrine.

GetTeam.description: Get the team on which script is currently being run.

GetTeamForPlayer.description: Gets the team of the specified player.

GetTeamMember.description: Get a member of a team.

GetTeamPlayers.description: Gets a list of Player IDs for the specified team.

GetTimeOfDay.description: Gets the curren time of day (0.0 is midnight, 0.5 is noon).

GetTower.description: Gets the specified tower on the specified team.

GetTowerAttackTarget.description: Gets the attack target of the specified tower on the specified team.

GetTreeLocation.description: Gets the location of the specified tree.

GetUnitList.description: Gets a list of visible units.

GetUnitPotentialValue.description: Gets the 0-255 potential-value location of a hero at the specified location and radius.

GetUnitToLocationDistance.description: Get the distance between a unit and a location.

GetUnitToLocationDistanceSqr.description: Get the squared distance between a unit and a location.

GetUnitToUnitDistance.description: Get the distance between two units.

GetUnitToUnitDistanceSqr.description: Get the squared distance between two units.

GetWorldBounds.description: Gets the minimum and maximum bounds of the world.

InstallCastCallback.description: Install a callback for whenever the specified player's units cast an ability or use an item.

InstallDamageCallback.description: Install a callback for whenever the specified player's units take damage.

IsCMBannedHero.description: Has the named hero been banned in Captain's Mode?

IsCMPickedHero.description: Has the named hero been picked in Captain's Mode?

IsCourierAvailable.description: Asks if a courier is available to use.

IsFlyingCourier.description: Gets whether a courier is a flying courier.

IsHeroAlive.description: Asks if the specified PlayerID is alive.

IsInCMBanPhase.description: Is Captain's Mode in Ban phase?

IsInCMPickPhase.description: Is Captain's Mode in Pick phase?

IsItemPurchasedFromSecretShop.description: Can the named item can be purchased from the secret shop?

IsItemPurchasedFromSideShop.description: Can the named item can be purchased from the side shop?

IsLocationPassable.description: Can the specified location currently be pathed through?

IsLocationVisible.description: Can the specified location currently be seen?

IsPlayerBot.description: Asks if a specific Player ID is a bot.

IsPlayerInHeroSelectionControl.description: Is this player allowed to currently allowed to select a hero?

IsRadiusVisible.description: Can the specified circle currently be seen?

IsShrineHealing.description: Gets whether the Shrine is actively healing or not.

IsTeamPlayer.description: Asks if a specific Player ID is a member of Radiant or Dire.

Max.description: Returns the smaller of the two supplied values.

Min.description: Returns the smaller of the two supplied values.

PointToLineDistance.description: Get the squared distance between a unit and a location.

RandomFloat.description: Get a random float within a range

RandomInt.description: Get a random int within a range

RandomVector.description: Get a random 2D vector of the specified length.

RealTime.description: Gets the real-world time since the app has started.  Does not pause with game pause.

RemapVal.description: Linearly remaps X from A,B to C,D

RemapValClamped.description: Linearly remaps X from A,B to C,D, clamping to C,D

RollPercentage.description: Rolls a number from 1 to 100 and returns true if the roll is less than or equal to the number specified

SelectHero.description: Selects a hero for a player.

SetCMCaptain.description: Sets a player to be Captain's Mode captain.
